org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.ui.song

Class SongController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.ui.song.SongController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstantiableController, InstantiableControllerView, InstantiableReinitializableControllerView, Reinitializable, RootController, StageAware

    public class SongController
extends java.lang.Object
implements InstantiableReinitializableControllerView, RootController
    Controller responsible for view and edit the tags of a song and its cover.

      • enableImageButton

        private void enableImageButton(javafx.scene.image.ImageView button,
                               boolean enable,
                               javafx.scene.control.Tooltip tooltip)
        Enables/disables the given button and performs the action by locking an atomic checker.
        Parameters:
        button - the button to enable/disable
        enable - whether enable the given button
        tooltip - a tooltip to install if the button is enabled; if enable is 'false', then any previously installed tooltip is uninstalled, despite the value of this parameter
